17 
18 import rospy
19 
20 from niryo_robot_msgs.msg import HardwareStatus
21 
22 
23 class AbstractFansManager(object):
24  def __init__(self):
25  self._fans_list = []
26 
27  self._hardware_status_subscriber = rospy.Subscriber(
28  '/niryo_robot_hardware_interface/hardware_status', HardwareStatus, self._callback_hardware_status)
29 
30  rospy.on_shutdown(self.shutdown)
31 
32  def __del__(self):
33  pass
34 
35  def shutdown(self):
36  if self._hardware_status_subscriber is None:
37  return
38 
39  try:
40  self._hardware_status_subscriber.unregister()
41  self._hardware_status_subscriber = None
42  except AssertionError:
43  return
44 
45  rospy.sleep(1)
46  rospy.loginfo("Fan Manager - Stop fans")
47  for fan in self._fans_list:
48  fan.value = False
49 
50  def _callback_hardware_status(self, msg):
51  for fan in self._fans_list:
52  fan.update(msg.rpi_temperature)
